ing: 1 (26 ounce) jar mango slices, drained and chopped
des: "Sweet and savory, this is a delightfully fresh and fruity pizza. Cream cheese, mango and walnuts on a hot baked pizza crust make a tropical, tasty treat!  You can also add a layer of fresh fruit."
ins:
Bake pizza crust according to package directions.
Brush crust with olive oil.  Spread cream cheese over crust.  Arrange chopped mango over the cream cheese, and sprinkle with nuts.  Slice, and serve.
